markdown.markdown: ```{r setup, include=FALSE} knitr::opts_chunk$set( echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, fig.align = "center" ) ``` ```{r} #| column: screen library(tidyverse) library(gtrendsR) library(showtext) library(ggthemes) library(cowplot) library(magick) library(ggimage) theme_set(theme_cowplot()) #font_add(family = "BloodyTerror-GOW9Z.ttf", regular = "BloodyTerror-GOW9Z.ttf") showtext_auto() #wednesday_search<-gtrendsR::gtrends( # time = "today 1-m" #) #wednesday_hits <- wednesday_search$interest_over_time %>% # mutate(date=as.Date(date), # hits = replace_na(as.numeric(hits),0)) ``` ## Education #### **University of Pennsylvania**, *Philadelphia, PA (Aug 2023 -- Present)* **Master of City Planning in Spatial Analytics** - Relevant courses: Geospatial Cloud Computing (SQL), Machine Learning in Remote Sensing (Python), Public Policy Analytics (R), Quantitative Analysis Methods (R) #### **University of Liverpool**, *Liverpool, UK* **Bachelor of Arts in Urban Planning** - Relevant courses: Geospatial Data Science (Python), Urban & Environmental Economics ## Professional Experience #### **Transport Planning and GIS Intern**, *Liverpool, UK (Jun - Sep 2022)* **Mott Macdonald** #### **Urban Planning and Design Intern**, *Suzhou, China (Jul - Aug 2021)* **Suzhou Planning & Design Research Institute** ## Research Experience #### **Geospatial Research Assistant**, *Philadelphia, PA (Dec 2023 - Present)* **Business and Conflict Barometer Initiative, The Wharton School** #### **Undergraduate Transport Researcher**, *Liverpool, UK (Apr 2022 - Jun 2023)* **School of Environmental Science, University of Liverpool** #### **Undergraduate Researcher**, *Suzhou, China (Jun - Sep 2021)* **Department of Urban Planning, Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University** ## Extracurricular Experience #### **Content Planning Board Member**, *Philadelphia, PA (Sep 2023 - Present)* **Wharton Future of Cities Conference** ## Skills & Hobbies - Technical skills: R (dplyr, tidyverse, etc.) | Python (pandas, numpy, etc.) | ArcGIS Pro, QGIS | Microsoft Excel | Adobe Illustrator & Photoshop - Interests: Amateur baker, world traveling, exploring parks, hiking, photography in new cities
